snippet: In a country known for its wines, microbreweries are surging, with the number of independent beer makers set to nearly double over the next year or so.
abstract: Microbreweries are surging in South Africa, a country known for its wines; number of independent beer makers in the region is set to nearly double in the coming year.
lead_paragraph: In a country known for its wines, microbreweries are surging, with the number of independent beer makers set to nearly double over the next year or so.

headline.seo: South Africa Adds Beer to the Wine List
headline.main: South Africa Adds Beer to the Wine List
headline.print_headline: South Africa Adds Beer to the Wine List
